schools.name: SEDOL Sector Programs
schools.school-summary: SEDOL Sector Programs, a public school located in Gages Lake, IL, serves grades PK, 5 in the Special Education District Lake County Sedol.
schools.district-name: Special Education District Lake County Sedol
schools.rating-description: The GreatSchools Rating helps parents compare schools within a state based on a variety of school quality indicators and provides a helpful picture of how effectively each school serves all of its students. Ratings are on a scale of 1 (below average) to 10 (above average) and can include test scores, college readiness, academic progress, advanced courses, equity, discipline and attendance data. We also advise parents to visit schools, consider other information on school performance and programs, and consider family needs as part of the school selection process.

schools.name: Woodland Primary School
schools.school-summary: Woodland Primary School, a public school located in Gages Lake, IL, serves grades PK-K in the Woodland Central Consolidated School District 50.

schools.name: Woodland Elementary School
schools.school-summary: Woodland Elementary School, a public school located in Gages Lake, IL, serves grades 1-3 in the Woodland Central Consolidated School District 50.It has received a GreatSchools Rating of 5 out of 10, based on a variety of school quality measures.
